description: A summary of what’s on today’s editorial page.
title: The New York Times
title_page: Opinion Report: Chicago Teachers' Strike - The New York Times
text:
From the editorial page
There’s new evidence that women are more likely to be harmed than helped by screening tests for ovarian cancer.
Another bad court ruling for the public financing of elections.
Nearly two months after the shooting spree in Colorado, victims are confronting a future of costly care.
Teachers’ strikes, because they hurt children and their families, are never a good idea.
